Name: Bigger Guns
About the game: Are you ready for the craziest PvP battle ever? Bigger guns is a competitive online PVP shooter game with IO and Deathmatch rules. From giant lollipops to viking axes, everything is a weapon. Choose your combat gear wisely and show everyone who is the best in the arena. Pick up cash to level up and get stronger and faster. Customize your warrior and battle in style with players from all over the world. Build Maps to be played Online in DeathMatch, Battle Royale or just to hangout with your friends in Open Sandbox. And, if you get bored...just make it rain . • Fast-paced gameplay • Cross-platform online battles • Crazy character combinations • Beautiful Voxel Artwork with amazing color and effects • Dynamic battles with lots of weapons (shotguns and chickens included) • Integrated Workshop Map Builder
